## Summary

Briefly describe the change and its motivation.

## Checklist (maintainers & automation)
- [ ] I have read and acknowledged `docs/AGENT_EXECUTION_PRIMER.md` if this PR introduces or modifies automation (CI/workflows/scripts).
- [ ] Changes include tests where applicable.
- [ ] CI passes (lint, unit tests, artifact build).
- [ ] No secrets are added to the repo.

## For automation / agents
If this PR will be created or updated by an automated agent or repository automation, the agent MUST include an explicit acknowledgement that it received and will obey the onboarding sentence in `docs/AGENT_EXECUTION_PRIMER.md`. Agent-generated PRs without this acknowledgement will be rejected by maintainers.
